alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 7:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla and south central Leon Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Woodville to Crawfordville. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Woodville, St. Marks, Tallahassee, Wakulla, Newport, Shadeville, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Lutterloh, Vereen, Southwood, Wakulla Beach, Bethel and Natural Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
